name: Break It - PC Breakout / Arkanoid WIP
name_original: Break It - PC Breakout / Arkanoid WIP
description:
An Arkanoid Clone. Coming on pretty well I think. Has four levels currently.

Use mouse to move bat. Release ball with either Mouse Button - will release in

direction of mouse button pressed. If you obtain fire power, use Left Mouse Button

to shoot. Because this is a demo, you can also press S to skip a level, and + & -

to change angle and velocity of ball. You can also swipe ball with bat to alter

angle and speed of ball. Still a bit of work to do on this game.
